title: Stabilize runtime boundary preconditions and postconditions for replay-safe lowering checks
feature: M03 Lane C runtime boundary assumption stabilization for lowering conformance

mode_matrix.name: debug-o0
abi_requirements: runtime boundary preconditions (nonnull probe and stable callback context) are explicit inputs to lowering checks
postconditions require exactly-once callback execution and balanced enter/exit boundary accounting
boundary assumption validation is deterministic and fail-closed for drifted pre/post state
runtime_assertions: M03c008_validate_boundary returns PRECONDITION_FAILURE for nil boundary probe
M03c008_validate_boundary returns POSTCONDITION_FAILURE for enter/exit or callback-count drift
M03c008_validate_boundary returns OK only when all boundary assumptions hold

mode_matrix.name: optimized-o2
abi_requirements: optimized lowering preserves explicit pre/post boundary assumptions from -O0
optimization does not relax boundary assumption checks or fail-closed behavior
boundary validation outcomes remain deterministic under optimization
runtime_assertions: boundary status outcomes remain equivalent to -O0 under optimization
pre/postcondition drift remains observable as deterministic non-OK status values

abi_field_stability.stability_property: boundary context precondition remains explicit and replay-stable
boundary callback count and enter/exit postconditions remain deterministic
